jellyfin.hostnameInvalid: Please enter a valid hostname (for example: jellyfin.local, localhost or 192.168.0.10)

auth.usernamePasswordRequired: Please enter your username and password
auth.noServiceConfigured: No authentication service configured. Please contact an administrator.
auth.welcome: Welcome to Scroblarr! Choose how you'd like to set up your admin account.
auth.plexConnectPrompt: Connect your Plex account to get started

health.issuesHint: Some syncs failed in the last 30 days

empty.title: No sync data yet
empty.description: Watch something on Plex or Jellyfin and it will appear here. Make sure webhooks are configured and your Trakt or TVTime account is linked in your profile.

stats.periodsUtc: Today / This week / This month use UTC.
stats.averages: Average syncs per day / week / month

users.title: Users
users.jellyfinCredentialsRequired: Jellyfin username and password are required

modals.bulkDeleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} user{{plural}}? This action cannot be undone.
modals.bulkDeleteMessage_plural: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} user{{plural}}? This action cannot be undone.

settings.title: Settings

general.title: General Settings
general.description: General application settings will be available here.
general.syncHistoryLimitDescription: Maximum number of sync history items to keep. Older items will be automatically removed. (10-10000)
general.apiKeyDescription: Global API key for API authentication.

settings.jellyfinServerDescription: Configure your Jellyfin server connection settings.
settings.jellyfinNotConfigured: No Jellyfin server has been configured yet.
settings.cannotRemoveOnlyServer: Cannot remove the only configured server. Configure Plex first.
settings.jellyfinLoginRequired: Login with your Jellyfin credentials to automatically generate an API key.
settings.jellyfinApiKeyDescription: API key is automatically generated during setup. You can manually update it here if needed.
settings.jellyfinApiKeyDescriptionNoKey: Login with your Jellyfin credentials above to automatically generate an API key, or enter one manually.
settings.removeJellyfinServerMessage:
Are you sure you want to remove the Jellyfin server configuration? This will:

• Clear all Jellyfin server settings
• Prevent importing new users from Jellyfin
• Prevent syncing for existing Jellyfin users
• Keep existing users and their sync history

This action cannot be undone.
settings.removeServerAdminWarning: As an admin, you must have at least one server configured. If you remove Jellyfin and only Jellyfin is configured, you may lose access. Please ensure Plex is configured first.
settings.plexServerDescription: Select the Plex server connection to use for importing users. This setting will be saved and used automatically.
settings.plexAuthRequired: To configure a Plex server, first authenticate with your Plex account as the admin. This will link your account and let Scroblarr discover your servers.
settings.noServersFound: No Plex servers found. Make sure your Plex Media Server is signed in to your Plex account.
settings.noConnectionSelected: No connection selected for this server.
settings.removePlexServerMessage:
Are you sure you want to remove the Plex server configuration? This will:

• Clear the Plex server URL setting
• Prevent importing new users from Plex
• Prevent syncing for existing Plex users
• Keep existing users and their sync history

This action cannot be undone.

integrations.title: Integrations
integrations.description: Connect your syncing service accounts to automatically sync your watched episodes.

linkedAccounts.title: Linked Accounts
linkedAccounts.description: Link your media server accounts to enable syncing.
linkedAccounts.notConfigured: No media servers are configured. Please ask an admin to configure Plex or Jellyfin in the settings.
linkedAccounts.unlinkConfirmMessage: This will remove your Plex account connection. You will need to link your account again to sync watched media.
linkedAccounts.adminWarning: As an admin, you must have at least one linked account. If you unlink Plex and only Plex is configured, you may lose access. Please ensure Jellyfin is configured and linked first.

trakt.description: Sync your watched movies and episodes to Trakt. Uses OAuth for secure authentication.
trakt.oauthInstructions: Click 'Authorize' to open Trakt in a new window. After authorizing, you'll receive an authorization code. Paste it below to complete the linking process.
trakt.unlinkMessage: Are you sure you want to unlink your Trakt account? This will stop syncing to Trakt.

tvtime.description: Sync your watched episodes automatically. Your credentials are stored securely.

settings.title: Sync Settings
settings.description: Mark media as rewatched only if it has been synced before.
settings.markMoviesAsRewatchedDescription: When enabled, movies that have been synced before will be marked as rewatches in TVTime.
settings.markEpisodesAsRewatchedDescription: When enabled, episodes that have been synced before will be marked as rewatches in TVTime.

tvtime.unlinkConfirmMessage: This will remove your TVTime account connection and all associated data. You will need to link your account again to sync watched episodes.

errors.deleteItemFailed: Failed to delete sync history item
errors.deleteItemsFailed: Failed to delete sync history items

sync.title: My Sync History
sync.searchPlaceholder: Search by title, source, or error...
sync.largeHistoryNotice: You have more than 500 sync history items. Search and quick filters work on the most recent 500 items. Use advanced filters and pagination to view older items.
sync.noResultsDescription: Try adjusting your filters or search query to see more results.
sync.noHistoryDescription: Your sync history will appear here once you start scrobbling media.

modals.clearMessage: Are you sure you want to clear all sync history? This action cannot be undone.
modals.bulkDeleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} sync history item{{plural}}? This action cannot be undone.
modals.bulkDeleteMessage_plural: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} sync history item{{plural}}? This action cannot be undone.

userImport.selectUsers: Please select at least one user to import
userImport.noServerConfigured: No server configured. Please configure Plex or Jellyfin in Settings.
userImport.noUsersFound: No users found on this server.
userImport.allUsersImported: All users from this server have already been imported.
